headline: 5 Insightful Analyst Questions From Norfolk Southern’s Q4 Earnings Call
summary: Norfolk Southern’s fourth quarter results reflected the impact of continued weakness in freight volumes and competitive pressures, with management noting that service and safety improvements were key internal achievements during a challenging period. CEO Mark George stated, “Q4 played out in an environment where volume was clearly softer than anyone had predicted,” and highlighted disciplined cost management as a counterbalance to external headwinds.
